name: Adam Waste
description: This is an episodic post apocalyptic sci-fi story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800 Sound Card: Integrated audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.2 Ghz Graphics: NVidia GeForce 9800 Sound Card: Integrated audio
